name: butterfly breeder
description:
🦋 breed some butterflies! 🦋 

The game can technically run on mobile, but it's best played on desktop.

Original inspiration was Flight Rising's dragon breeding system because that game has been constantly on my mind since August 2019.

-------------------------------
